roleset.name: send a text message via cell phone

example.name: text-v: args0 and 2
example.text: Make him email or text you .

example.name: text-v: with arg3
example.text: I texted him about the Van Halen concert this May.
example.arg: about the Van Halen concert this May.

example.name: text-v: All args
example.text: The wine spoke to me so and I texted him about it?..that I was by no means inviting myself to his b-day, I was just wondering when it was.
example.arg: I was by no means inviting myself to his b-day, I was just wondering when it was.

example.name: text-n
example.text: # ::snt i'd suggest *PRO* giving her another text asking perhaps to meet up - cinema, dvd, or grab a coffee/lunch before lectures or something.
example.arg: asking perhaps to meet up - cinema, dvd, or grab a coffee/lunch before lectures or something.

example.name: text_message-v
example.text: Jon Heder who plays an adult paperboy who gets excited when his mom text messages him about having macaroni and cheese for dinner.
example.arg: about having macaroni and cheese for dinner.

roleset.note: TEXT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. Comparison to 'email'. (from text.01-v)
